svg.text: It Always Seems Impossible Until It's Done

metadata.data: {"brand_name": "Ripen.in", "brand_description": "A venture studio dedicated to creating transformative digital products and services that leverage the internet", "design_description": "we need a quote \"It Always Seems Impossible Until It's Done\" in the center and our logo on the top with fancy design element of circle and a highlight behind the circle and the quote should overlay on the top of the circle element", "model_used": "gpt-4-turbo"}
